section.title: Xubuntu packageset
section.para: The Xubuntu team maintains a certain subset of packages in the Ubuntu archive. The Xubuntu packageset for the current development release.

note.para: All per-release packageset lists are available at http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-archive/packagesets/.

section.title: Development PPAs
section.para: The Xubuntu developers use several PPAs (personal package archives) for staging, testing and previewing new packages and package versions. These PPAs can be found under the Xubuntu Developers page on Launchpad.
Currently, the official PPAs for development use are:

seglistitem.seg: A staging PPA for Xubuntu. The packages and package versions in this PPA are being prepared for inclusion in Xubuntu. The packages are uploaded for the convenience of people testing these new package versions and features. Some of them are daily builds used in testing.
Git/Bzr daily builds for packages related to Xubuntu and/or Xfce4.

A preview PPA for Xubuntu. The packages in this PPA are considered for inclusion in the Ubuntu repositories and/or Xubuntu at a later time. The packages are uploaded for the convenience of people willing to preview the new features.
